name: Snake Bite
description:
A technical descent off Lee Mountain. Reccomended for experienced canyoneers.


(1) 150' Rope. (1) 200' Rope. (1) 200' Pull Chord.

Fiddle Stick/retrievable anchor(optional)

Pg rating is for the re-belay between R2 and R3.

Approach

We approached via a a 4th class scramble up the south face of Lee Mtn. The Kml track is not currently available.

Descent

R1: 50' into slot off tree.


R21:40' From Bolts at edge of slot LDC and High, to Bolts RDC on arete.


R3: 190' to flat ground.

Followed by a few shorter drops.

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=3342989575792386&id=100002441281189

Background

First Descent Lars Romig & Eric Moorcroft
